name: InnerMonkey
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
We all have an inner monkey, urging us to have another slice of cake or skip our next workout. In each episode I reflect on one of the various ways my inner monkey influences me and discuss solutions for how to try and control your inner monkey, to help you live the life you want to live.

innermonkeypodcast.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
